coref: One day a Stag came to a Sheep and asked Stag to lend a Sheep a measure of wheat. a Sheep a Sheep knew a Sheep for a very swift runner, who could easily take a Sheep out of reach, were a Sheep so inclined. So Stag asked a Sheep if a Sheep knew someone who would answer for a Sheep. Yes, yes, answered a Stag a Stag confidently, the Wolf has promised to be my surety. the Wolf! exclaimed a Sheep indignantly. Do you think I would trust you on such security? I know the Wolf! the Wolf takes what the Wolf wants and runs off with it without paying. As for you, you can use your legs so well that I should have little chance of collecting the debt if I had to catch you for the debt!
